titles.title: Las Vegas Wash Program Extension Act
Las Vegas Wash Program Extension Act
A bill to amend the Water Resources Development Act of 2000 to modify the authorization of appropriations for the Las Vegas Wash program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
Las Vegas Wash Program Extension Act
This bill increases the authorization of appropriations for the Bureau of Reclamation to participate, in partnership with the Las Vegas Wash Coordinating Committee, in the implementation of the Las Vegas Wash wetlands restoration and Lake Mead improvement project. The Las Vegas Wash in Nevada connects the Las Vegas Valley with Lake Mead.
